ygData.subject: RE: Letter to GZ - Draft 3
ygData.msgSnippet: very true, i hope we can add this.  it is extremely hard to stack verses of victory with any other song, usually trying to stack it with mystic shielding.  so
ygData.messageBody:
very true, i hope we can add this. it is extremely hard to stack verses of
victory with any other song, usually trying to stack it with mystic
shielding. so many missed notes i usually play one or the other.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> Another thing you might want to add is it is near impossible
> to stack your
> high level songs (I miss on average 20-30 notes a fight
> trying to twist
> cessation and cresendo) So if ya think you are smashing
> buttons now just
> wait =) Maybe add in that our instrument skills should not be
> capped at 200
> but 250 or 255.. (Why on earth would they want to cap us in
> these skills??)
> I am fearing the thought of stacking Cessation and Verses...
> As for skills the only one I am partial to is track...nice
> high cap ; )
> maybe hide would be good if they didn't cap it insanely low.
> Karnek D'Jester
> L48 Bard of Erollisi Marr
